pullRequest.title: KOGITO-2008: Configured common package to share react components
pullRequest.bodyText: This pull request intended to configure a common package in lerna monorepo to share components that are common in both management and task consoles.

@@ -0,0 +1,75 @@
+{
+  "name": "@kogito-apps/common",
+  "version": "1.0.0",
+  "private": true,
+  "main": "index.js",

+  "repository": {
+    "type": "git",
+    "url": "https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-apps.git"
+  },
+  "scripts": {
+    "precommit": "lint-staged",
+    "build:prod": "yarn run lint && webpack --config webpack.prod.js && yarn run test",
+    "test:report": "yarn test --ci --reporters=jest-junit",
+    "test": "jest --runInBand --ci --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit",
+    "update-snapshot": "jest --updateSnapshot",
+    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",

+    "format": "prettier --config ../../.prettierrc --check --write './src/**/*.{tsx,ts,js}'",
+    "build:bundle-profile": "webpack --config webpack.prod.js --profile --json > stats.json",
+    "bundle-profile:analyze": "yarn build:bundle-profile && webpack-bundle-analyzer ./stats.json",
+    "clean": "rimraf dist",
+    "cypress:run": "cypress run",
+    "cypress:open": "cypress open"
+  },
+  "dependencies": {
+    "@apollo/react-hooks": "3.1.3",
+    "@patternfly/react-core": "3.140.11",

+    }
+  },

nodes.bodyText: "Component" only has one m in it - it's consistent several places in this PR as far as I can see but probably should be fixed to avoid future confusion.
Typo - "Task Console Logo"
Are these placeholders or left over from an example?
Typo "Task Console Logo"
It looks like there is a typo in the spelling of the folder "PageLayoutComponent"

nodes.bodyText: Does this make sense? Cypress tests require a running application, can you start something from the common package?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,14 +13,38 @@
     "build:prod": "lerna run build:prod --stream",
     "cypress:run": "lerna run cypress:run",
     "cypress:run-management-console": "cypress run --project ./packages/management-console",
-    "cypress:run-task-console": "cypress run --project ./packages/task-console"
+    "cypress:run-task-console": "cypress run --project ./packages/task-console",
+    "cypress:run-common": "cypress run --project ./packages/common"

nodes.bodyText: Are you sure about this change? IMO we've recently moved from 2.6.8 -> local and now back?
Yep, build fails because of this, IMO just rebase on master and the error should go away.
Again - revert the change
Looking at this one and management-console tsconfig.json, there we have excluded 'node_modules' dir, is that required here too? I am not sure what the purpose there is.
